audioText: Cette façon de résoudre le problème me semble très efficace et créative.
question: What does the speaker think about this way of solving the problem?
options: It seems very effective and creative
It is too complicated and confusing
It takes too much time to implement
It is outdated and needs improvement
explanation: The speaker says 'Cette façon de résoudre le problème me semble très efficace et créative' - This way of solving the problem seems very effective and creative to me.
